title: Instructional Design for Mathematics Simulation-Based Pedagogy Using Generative AI

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and experience with VR device usage
context.additional_context: Mathematics curriculum design combining generative AI tools with the 4PADAFE matrix in BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) settings

learning_goals: Learners can independently design mathematical problem-solving simulations using generative AI tools three or more times
Learners can develop VR-based mathematics learning modules by applying the 8-stage framework of the 4PADAFE matrix
Learners can critically analyze and improve generative AI outputs based on evaluation criteria
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
